member.name: D3D12_INFO_QUEUE_FILTER_DESC
member.summary: Allow or deny certain types of messages to pass through a filter.

member.name: D3D12_INFO_QUEUE_FILTER_DESC.NumCategories
member.summary: Number of message categories to allow or deny.

member.name: D3D12_INFO_QUEUE_FILTER_DESC.pCategoryList
member.summary: Array of message categories to allow or deny. Array must have at least NumCategories members (see ).

member.name: D3D12_INFO_QUEUE_FILTER_DESC.NumSeverities
member.summary: Number of message severity levels to allow or deny.

member.name: D3D12_INFO_QUEUE_FILTER_DESC.pSeverityList
member.summary: Array of message severity levels to allow or deny. Array must have at least NumSeverities members (see ).

member.name: D3D12_INFO_QUEUE_FILTER_DESC.NumIDs
member.summary: Number of message IDs to allow or deny.

member.name: D3D12_INFO_QUEUE_FILTER_DESC.pIDList
member.summary: Array of message IDs to allow or deny. Array must have at least NumIDs members (see ).
